item.title: Fantasia Film Festival 2025: Must-See Genre Films Include ‘Together,’ ‘Lurker,’ ‘F—toys’ and More
item.description: The 29th edition of the Fantasia International Film Festival is set to launch on July 16, and there is plenty to love for genre fans. The Montreal-set fest is an annual hotspot for early premieres of
